DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize clinical trial objective evaluate effect train vibratory platform body composition , muscular strength functional capacity , flexibility biochemical profile elderly woman . It do city Santa Cruz Sul , Rio Grande Sul , elderly woman age 60 80 years-old , within municipal limit nearby area select randomly brown envelope note state belong control vibratory platform group , participant receive whole body vibration platform . The recruiting do institution e-mail public call . Women evaluate anamesis . On evaluation , questionaire apply , order evaluate don´t counterindications vibratory platform . They evaluate general health , socio-economical status , history physical activity . Participants doubt clear study , write consent sign . Before intervention whole body vibration , nutritional physical activity aspect evaluate . The treatment period vibratory platform 8 week , , anthropometrical , biochemical , strength , flexibility , palmar prehension strength , metabolic basal load , functional capacity measurement take . Before every session vibratory platform , heart rate , respiratory rate , arterial pressure , peripheric oxygen saturation evaluate . The interventional procedure do vibratory platform ( Power Plate® , model my7™ , UK ) frequency 30 - 40 Hz , low ( 2mm ) high ( 4mm ) amplitude . Training last 8 week 3 session per week , last 30 second 1 minute training , 30 second 1 minute rest , subject position orthosis knee flexion 15° foot width distance 20 cm . The frequency 35 Hz amplitude 2 mm . The study aim contribute reduce body mass index body fat percentage , improve lean mass , palmar prehension strength , muscular strength lower limbs flexibility , also obtain well biochemical profile train period .
DOC.brief_title: Whole Body Vibrations Functional Capacity , Muscular Strength , Biochemical Profile Elders
DOC.detailed_description: After evaluate anamnesis write consent sign clarify , elderly woman evaluate intervention period 8 week train vibratory platform . First , academic nutrition degree University Santa Cruz Sul ( UNISC ) perform nutritional evaluation subject , ask 24 hour eat habit , interference subject diet , also keep habit end trial . Then socio-economical indicator evaluation questionnaire socio-economical classification Brazilian Association Research Companies.The evaluation level physical activity do International Physical Activity Questionnaire . The anthropometrical evaluation consider height , weight , body mass index , waist circumference , hip circumference , hip-waist ratio . Body fat percentage , lean mass , basal metabolic rate obtain bioimpedance ( Biodynamics 450 , USA ) , recommend 5 hour fast prior procedure . Biochemical test do collect blood University Santa Cruz Exercise Biochemistry Laboratory , follow variable : hemogram , glycemia , cholesterol , triglyceride , Urea , creatine , uric acid . Oxidative stress evaluation Thiobarbituric acid reactive substance ( TBARS ) test do urine collection week , intervention immediately session . Control group subject urine collect twice : day card hand last day evaluation . Physical evaluation do week prior intervention vibratory platform last week treatment , flexibility Wells Bank evaluate , well low limb muscular strength maximum repetition test , palmar prehension strength obtain dynamometer . Functional Capacity evaluate six minute walk test . The intervention procedure vibratory platform ( Power Plate® , model my7™ , UK ) last 8 week , 3 time week work period last 30 second 1 hour rest period 30 second 1 minute total session time 10 20 minute . The individual position orthosis knee flexion 15° foot width distance 20 cm . A frequency 35 Hz amplitude 2 mm use . The protocol number session , time session , time vibration rest , follow : 1st 6th session , total time 10 minute , 30 second vibration alternate 1 minute rest ; 7th 12th session , total time 10 minute , vibration rest time 1 minute ; 13th trough 18th session , total session time 15 minute , vibration rest time 1 minute , 19th 24th session , total time 20 minute , time vibration 1 minute rest time 30 second . Statistical analysis : This do use Statistical Package Social Science ( Version 23.0 USA ) program . To test data normality investigator use Kolmogorov-Smirnov test . Parametric data present mean standard deviation non-parametric data median interquartile interval . The intragroup deltas pre post training period vibratory platform group evaluate Student´s T Test ( pair T test non-parametric equivalent intergroup comparison ) . To evaluate body composition , metabolic rate , palmar prehension strength , flexibility , muscular strength , distance travel Six minute walk test ( 6SMWT ) , biochemical profile oxidative stress group evaluate pre post training period , Student´s T test use . Significance level p < 0,05 . Sample size : It base previous study Rees et al . ( 2008 ) . To detect difference 8,9 W/Kg knee flexion torque pre post training vibratory platform , consider p value < 0,05 , statistical power 80 % 10 % loss , 34 subject need group evaluate pre post training .
DOC.criteria: Female age 60 old . Nonphysical activity practice elderly woman . Maximum weight 159 kg . BMI 18 39 kg/m² . Systemic arterial hypertension , ( systolic arterial pressure > 140 mmHg diastolic arterial pressure > 90 mmHg ) . Cognitive compromise neutropenia . Individual subject surgical procedure , bone prosthetics implant cardiac pacemaker . Individuals diagnose labyrinthitis , disc hernia , thrombosis , decompensated diabetes cancer . Cognitive deficit . Orthopedic deficit make participation impossible . Persistent discomfort use vibratory platform . Individuals miss three consecutive training session vibratory platform .
